review: I have a Roku and i bought this for a different tv. The main reason i got this is for gaming. The apps are pretty much the same as the Roku. Roku has amazon music and amazon video but its not as polished as the Amazon Fire TV version. The games are many and that was the reason i got the Amazon Fire TV. How ever some games are so big I had to uninstall them because it took up too much space. The 8gb storage is  not enough! I currently have about 5 games small games. Large games like Asphalt and Grand Theft Auto are not an option for me, they are too big. The game controller works fine but its a bit over priced. So if you want this for music and video it is fine but if you want it for gaming go with some android box or something else the storage isn't big enough.
